component.name: XIVLauncher
component.summary: Launcher & seamless Linux integration for Final Fantasy XIV Online

description.p: XIVLauncher is a custom launcher for FINAL FANTASY XIV that offers painless patching, a customized WINE version for perfect compatibility with FFXIV, a multitude of useful plugins and seamless Steam Deck integration. Install, log in, patch, and get started!
Please note that this flatpak may not work properly on Steam Deck. See our Steam Deck FAQ, linked below under help, for more information and an alternative option.
